title: 'I found out my hubby was cheating after I saw the pimples on his back'
text:
She had been happily married for two years until her impressive sleuth work revealed the truth!

A scorned wife has busted her cheating husband after finding another woman had burst the zits on his back.

The unidentified woman, from Erzincan, Turkey, had been happily married – or so she thought – for two years.

Tolga Aydemir, 37, the woman’s lawyer, said alarm bells started ringing when she watched her husband change clothes, and noticed the spots on his back had already been squeezed.

For more stories like this, head to The Sun.

When she confronted him about the popped pimples, he changed the subject quickly.

Dr Pimple Popper at work 75563 She's your go-to medico when you're in a spot of bother!

All was revealed when hubby went to sleep...

She decided not to push the issue, but went through his phone messages while he was asleep.

The woman was horrified to discover WhatsApp messages from his lover – and even the spot-popping incident was mentioned.

“At first it seemed strange to me, but then the woman showed me the WhatsApp conversation," Tolga said.

“He was actually saying to his girlfriend that his wife had started to suspect him because of his acne.

“I’ve looked at many divorce cases before, but this is the first time I've seen something like that. ‘Sherlock Holmes was only a little bit better than this woman.”
